import { Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, CardText, Badge, Button, Collapse, Form, FormGroup, InputGroup, InputGroupText, Input } from 'reactstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Posts.css' import { useState } from 'react'; const styles = { labelInput: { backgroundColor: 'rgb(35, 42, 44)', color: '#fff', borderTop: 'none', borderLeft: 'none', borderBottom: 'none', fontWeight: 'bold', marginRight: '1rem' }, input: { backgroundColor: '#373E40', color: '#fff', border: 'none', margin: '1rem' }, formulario: { width: '100%', height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#373E40', borderRadius: '20px', border: 'none', }, card: { border: 'none', backgroundColor: '#373E40', }, botonPublicarRespuesta: { backgroundColor: '#D8315B', border: 'none', margin: '1rem' } } function Post (args) { const { elemento } = args const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return ( {elemento.autor} {elemento.tema}
{elemento.contenido}
Respuesta:
) } export default Post
